Itching
Mild itching is common in 
pregnancy because of the 
increased blood supply to the 
skin. In late pregnancy the skin 
of the abdomen is stretched 
and this may also cause 
itchiness.
How to avoid itching
• Wearing loose clothing 
may help.
• You may also want to avoid 
synthetic materials.
